subject: Re: JUnit 4 restructuring -- assertThat(..., Constraint)
msgSnippet: ... Nice. (Good grief; I feel like I ve wondered into the jBehave discussion list here!  ;-) http://www.ibiblio.org/maven/jbehave/current/website/ for the
messageBody:
>> --- David Saff wrote:
>>> public void <T> assertThat (T obj, Constraint<T> constraint);
--- David Saff <saff@m...> wrote:
> [...] There is a reason. Read this out loud, and you might
> see why the flip feels right:
>
> assertThat(x, isLessThan(5));

Nice.


(Good grief; I feel like I've wondered into the jBehave discussion
list here! ;-)

http://www.ibiblio.org/maven/jbehave/current/website/
for the curious.
